description: Your boy 'C Squared' is back, by himself, cold chillin'!  Hang with the Next Door Stallion, Cody Cummings as he relaxes with an adult DVD and does some weight lifting. If you wanna learn to roll with the big dog, you'll need to see how he gets down.  So fire up your own Cody-sized throbber and cum along on this epic chill session.   Enjoy!
title: Cold Chillin'
